text.section:
A person having the intention of promoting or facilitating the commission of a crime is guilty of criminal conspiracy when he:
Agrees with one (1) or more persons that at least one (1) of them will engage in conduct constituting that crime or an attempt or solicitation to commit such a crime; or
Agrees to aid one or more persons in the planning or commission of that crime or an attempt or solicitation to commit such a crime.
